item.title: shelly mcp claude

Manage Claude Desktop MCP servers

Synopsis

Options

item.title: shelly mcp configure
item.description:
shelly mcp configure

Configure AI assistant MCP integration

Synopsis

Configure AI assistant MCP integration.

This command writes the necessary configuration to enable AI assistants to use the Shelly CLI via MCP (Model Context Protocol).

Supported AI assistants: –claude-desktop Configure Claude Desktop app –claude-code Configure Claude Code (VS Code extension / CLI) –gemini Configure Gemini CLI

You can specify multiple flags to configure all at once.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly mcp - MCP server for AI assistant integration
